thread.section_title: Hotel Joke - Astotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: One of the best Hotels I stayed in
thread.title_full: One of the best Hotels I stayed in - Review of Hotel Joke - Astotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: PatFatCat15
title: One of the best Hotels I stayed in
text: Such a familiar and cosy athmosphere I haven't seen in a while. I don't know where to start, the location is great, walking distance to Moulin Rouge. The staff is friendly, professional and very welcoming. Even it is no luxuray Hotel it offers everything you need to have a unforgetable trip to Paris. Free coffee and drinks at the reception, cakes and fruits for free as well. One highlight for me was the design it's catchy and well done.
